keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will be an unwavering vote against Heathrow expansion.
I'll stand with you against Tory towers that will blight our area.
We need more affordable homes built. Local families and the environment will be better off for cleaner, better cared for council estates.

housing.content: We need more affordable homes built. Local families and the environment will be better off for cleaner, better cared for council estates.

leaflet.personalStatement: I served for eight years as a councillor locally. There's a huge amount a council can do to improve our everyday lives.

politicalExperience.achievements: During service as councillor, worked on several improvements for everyday lives of people.

images.caption: Stuart being interviewed for Channel 4 News outside his headquarters in Feham Road, right in the heart of Putney.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet provides a timeline of the candidate's local involvement and highlights the key policy areas of Heathrow, overdevelopment, and housing.
